title: Exploring the multifaceted properties: electronic, magnetic, Curie temperature, elastic, thermal, and thermoelectric characteristics of gadolinium-filled PtSb3 skutterudite
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17364-17379
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01303D, Paper
Open Access

Poorva Nayak, Dinesh C. Gupta
This guide covers skutterudite compounds' structural, physical, electronic, and magnetic properties, offering insights into their metallic behavior through detailed density of states analysis.
